trans-unit.source: Restore a deleted Azure SQL database with REST API
trans-unit.target: Restore a deleted Azure SQL database with REST API

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Azure SQL Database, restore deleted database, recover deleted database, REST API
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Azure SQL Database, restore deleted database, recover deleted database, REST API

trans-unit.source: Restore a deleted Azure SQL database with REST API
trans-unit.target: Restore a deleted Azure SQL database with REST API

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: This guide shows you how to restore a deleted Azure SQL database with REST API.
trans-unit.target: This guide shows you how to restore a deleted Azure SQL database with REST API.

trans-unit.source: Links to more detailed operations are provided.
trans-unit.target: Links to more detailed operations are provided.

trans-unit.source: Restoring a deleted Azure SQL database creates a new database.
trans-unit.target: Restoring a deleted Azure SQL database creates a new database.

trans-unit.source: The service automatically selects the service tier based on the backup used at the restore point.
trans-unit.target: The service automatically selects the service tier based on the backup used at the restore point.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you have available quota on the logical server to create another database.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you have available quota on the logical server to create another database.

trans-unit.source: If you'd like to request an increased quota, contact <link><linkText>Azure Support</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: If you'd like to request an increased quota, contact <link><linkText>Azure Support</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Restrictions and Security
trans-unit.target: Restrictions and Security

trans-unit.source: See <link><linkText>Restore a deleted Azure SQL database in the Azure portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link><linkText>Restore a deleted Azure SQL database in the Azure portal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: How to: Restore a deleted Azure SQL database using REST API
trans-unit.target: How to: Restore a deleted Azure SQL database using REST API

trans-unit.source: List all of your restorable deleted databases by using the <link><linkText>List Restorable Dropped Databases</linkText><title></title></link> operation.
trans-unit.target: List all of your restorable deleted databases by using the <link><linkText>List Restorable Dropped Databases</linkText><title></title></link> operation.

trans-unit.source: Get the details for the deleted database you want to restore by using the <link><linkText>Get Restorable Dropped Database</linkText><title></title></link> operation.
trans-unit.target: Get the details for the deleted database you want to restore by using the <link><linkText>Get Restorable Dropped Database</linkText><title></title></link> operation.

trans-unit.source: Begin your restore by using the <link><linkText>Create Database Restore Request</linkText><title></title></link> operation.
trans-unit.target: Begin your restore by using the <link><linkText>Create Database Restore Request</linkText><title></title></link> operation.

trans-unit.source: Track the status of your restore by using the <link><linkText>Database Operation Status</linkText><title></title></link> operation.
trans-unit.target: Track the status of your restore by using the <link><linkText>Database Operation Status</linkText><title></title></link> operation.

trans-unit.target: Next steps
